code: import{Card,CardHeader,CardTitle,CardText,CardBody,Input,FormGroup,Label,Row,Col}from'reactstrap';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var InputSizes=function InputSizes(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardHeader,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CardTitle,{tag:"h4",children:"Horizontal form label sizing"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardBody,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardText,{children:["Be sure to use ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("code",{children:"size=\"sm\""})," or ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("code",{children:"size=\"lg\""})," with your",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("code",{children:"<Label>"}),"s or ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("code",{children:"<legend>"}),"s to correctly follow the size of input size."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{sm:"12",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FormGroup,{row:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{sm:"3",size:"lg",for:"input-large-horizontal",children:"Large"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{sm:"9",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{type:"text",id:"input-large-horizontal",bsSize:"lg",placeholder:"Large Input"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FormGroup,{row:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{sm:"3",for:"input-default-horizontal",children:"Default"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{sm:"9",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{type:"text",id:"input-default-horizontal",placeholder:"Default Input"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(FormGroup,{row:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Label,{sm:"3",size:"sm",for:"input-small-horizontal",children:"Small"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{sm:"9",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{type:"text",id:"input-small-horizontal",bsSize:"sm",placeholder:"Small Input"})})]})]})})]})]});};export default InputSizes;

sourcesContent: import { Card, CardHeader, CardTitle, CardText, CardBody, Input, FormGroup, Label, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' const InputSizes = () => { return ( Horizontal form label sizing Be sure to use size="sm" or size="lg" with your <Label>s or <legend>s to correctly follow the size of input size. ) } export default InputSizes
